description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play as fifty foot Annunaki Princess who got attacked by the crazy citizens.  Use various weapons and survive forty levels of onslaught.  Can you teach these silly citizens a lesson?
